title: PlayStation Blocks Call of Duty From Game Pass -  Kinda Funny Games Daily 10.19.22
description:
Filing from Microsoft has been released and there's a lot to cover! Let's talk about Xbox taking on Apple and Google, Call of Duty being restricted from Game Pass, and an update on the Bayonetta 3 fiasco.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start﻿
00:05:14 - Housekeeping

A new Kinda Funny Gamescast is up this morning! It’s Greg’s review of Ghostbusters, Mike’s preview of Dead Space, my impressions of Street Fighter 6, and Tim’s Marvel Snap impressions. That’s up on youtube.com/kindafunnygames and on podcast services around the globe.

If you’re getting ready for Gotham Knights, Barrett edited together all four episodes of The Arkham Files together into one long video to get us all hyped and to look back at the Arkham games one last time before Gotham Knights releases this Friday! Check it out on YouTube.com/KindaFunnyGames


The Roper Report  -

00:08:21 - Microsoft is planning an Xbox mobile storefront to rival Apple and Google
00:20:32 - Call Of Duty may not appear on Game Pass ‘for a number of years’
00:31:07 - Ad
00:33:22 - The Plot Thickens with Bayonetta’s former voice actor
00:47:35 - Konami has leaked their own Silent Hill reveal ahead of today's stream
00:54:41 - Spider-Man 2 is still on track for 2023
00:57:16 - Callisto Protocol Confirms It's Not Delayed and is getting 60 FPS
00:59:19 - Out today
01:01:23 - You’re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg & Tim
